@ skrobtrace, I’d love for you to find one other person who’s made the analogy of XRP articles about Ripple being equivalent to Bitcoin articles about Coinbase. I’ll wait.
They gave me back the Bitcoin that I already owned. It was worth quite a bit more when I sent it to them. They would have made out well had they actually filled my order.

It’s also fair to note that we don’t know how much Bitcoin or ETH somebody like Coinbase holds. The people behind Coinbase could hold a majority of both and we have no way to know. It is only XRP that we can be sure of because Ripple chooses to be transparent. I commend that.
I think it shows that the # Bitcoin ecosystem could turn into a shittier replica of our current financial system, if we let it.
I think Bitcoin and XRP serve entirely different purposes the success/failure of one is independent of the other.
